body_html: renorm is a weird function (it's not clipping a norm along a given dim), and should be probably deprecated and renamed to sth else. It's basically looping over the dim you give it, viewing all (n-dimensional) slices as vectors and clipping their norm.
body_text: renorm is a weird function (it's not clipping a norm along a given dim), and should be probably deprecated and renamed to sth else. It's basically looping over the dim you give it, viewing all (n-dimensional) slices as vectors and clipping their norm.
body: `renorm` is a weird function (it's not clipping a norm along a given dim), and should be probably deprecated and renamed to sth else. It's basically looping over the dim you give it, viewing all (n-dimensional) slices as vectors and clipping their norm.
